title: Glossary
content: Glossary | USPTO Skip to main content An official website of the United States government Here’s how you know keyboard_arrow_down close An official website of the United States government Here’s how you know keyboard_arrow_down Official websites use .gov A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States. The site is secure. A lock ( lock ) or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
